name: Fixie
help: Fixie is a .NET modern test framework similar to NUnit and xUnit, but with an emphasis on low-ceremony defaults and flexible customization.

tasks.help: The <c>dotnet fixie</c> command is used to execute Fixie unit tests in a given project.

properties.name: Configuration
properties.help: The configuration under which to build. When this option is omitted, the default configuration is `Debug`.

properties.name: NoBuild
properties.help: Skip building the test project prior to running it.

properties.name: Framework
properties.help: Only run test assemblies targeting a specific framework.

properties.name: Report
properties.help: Write test results to the specified path, using the xUnit XML format.

properties.name: CustomArguments
properties.help: Arbitrary arguments made available to custom discovery/execution classes.
